entry.title: qt-3
How to set up Unbuntu21.04 LTS QT developing environment(1)
entry.content:
1. download https://download.qt.io/archive/qt/ latest 5.14.2

  2. chmod +x åŠ æƒé™

  3. ./filename.run

  4. sudo apt-get install g++ (c++ complier)

  5. sudo apt-get install libfontconfig1 (font library)

  6. sudo apt-get install build-essential (if no complier found)

OK enjoy

source : ( aliyun no g++. use tsinghua source)

entry.title: How to set up raspberry QT developing environment(1)
entry.content:
1. download the raspian and installed .

  2. change to domestic source 

     # ç¼–è¾‘ `/etc/apt/sources.list` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåˆ é™¤åŸæ–‡ä»¶æ‰€æœ‰å†…å®¹ï¼Œç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹å–ä»£ï¼š deb http://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/raspbian/raspbian/ buster main non-free contrib rpi deb-src http://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/raspbian/raspbian/ buster main non-free contrib rpi # ç¼–è¾‘ `/etc/apt/sources.list.d/raspi.list` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåˆ é™¤åŸæ–‡ä»¶æ‰€æœ‰å†…å®¹ï¼Œç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹å–ä»£ï¼š deb http://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/raspberrypi/ buster main ui

  3. sudo apt-get update / sudo apt-get upgrade

  4. sudo apt-get install qt5-default
    sudo apt-get install qtcreator
    sudo apt-get install qtmultimedia5-dev
    sudo apt-get install libqt5serialport5-dev

  5. if cannot find kits or a triangle with yellow ! sign that
    sudo apt-get install qtdeclarative5-dev 

     FIX this issue!!!

  6. then open the icon qtcreator and build one new projects

  7. end

entry.title: MultiFlex/QFM project experience No.8 (Simens Count module for Flowmeter "-1" issue)
entry.content:
If use 6ES7138-4DA04-0AB0 Count 24V/100kHz module for flowmeter function and monitor the value as â€œ-1â€ in the PLC.

in the Selection tool there will be a alarm

so one extra power mudule needed.

entry.title: MultiFlex/QFM project experience No.7 (PLC programs)
entry.content:
Commissioning Process

  1. check 24V voltage logic/ safety circuit and power on
  2. download hardware configuration to PLC and configure the frequency & Motor optimization
  3. run main conveyor/ sidewall/ connecting conveyor/ control belt same time same speed
  4. configure the segments , auto/manual to upper/lower position
  5. configure the pumps / flowmeter/ waterlevel / temperature sensor / hydralic / boostersâ€¦
  6. â€¦

PLC logics structure.

  1. Dry Part

    (1) CallConveyors[FB18]
    include main conveyor 100T1/ Sidewall Left 101T1/ Sidewall Right 102T1/ Connecting Belt 103T1/ Conveyor Belt 104T1/ Block height Measurement 1~8
    (2) CallCuttingRoller[FB21]
    paper Knife
    (3) CallFoamWall[FB20]
    Sidewall 107T1 to control the Horizontal move inside/outside
    (4) CallPaper[FB7]
    120T1 121T1 122T1 123T1
    (5) CallPortal[FB70]
    move segment1&2 portal forward/backward
    (6) CallSegments[FB2]
    Segments 1â€¦7 move up/down
    (7) CallStripWinder[FB34]
    124T1 125T1
  2. PDE data
  3. Tank Storage

    interface for the customer
  4. Wet Part

    (1) Call Additive Components[FB15] / Call Colour Components[FB17] / Call ISO Components[FB14] / Call Novalflex Components[FB29] / Call Polyol Components[FB9]
    all used for the pumps include (Production/recirculation values .. frequencyâ€¦)
    (2) CallMixer[FB27]
    Mixer running / Mixer up&down logic

entry.title: MultiFlex/QFM project experience No.6 (Motor wire width / Dt35 teach / Sidewall width putty / motor wire connection)
entry.content:
1. After configurate the motors â€œMotor Optimizationâ€ needed , one parameter should be set.

    values according to this formula

  2. For Conveyor-100T1 / ConvBelt 103T1 / ConvBelt 104T1 need additional settings

  3. DT35 plug wire connection

  4. DT35 teach expire time

  5. DT35 teach process



  6. Putty inclinometer for Sidewall Width adjustment, one black bridge controls the sensitive for the actual width measurement , if not bridge the range will be decreased and more stable

  7. Double ğŸ”º motor connection

  8. ğŸ”º motor connection but half

entry.title: MultiFlex/QFM project experience No.5 (cutter / rotary switch / limit switch / segments status / ups)
entry.content:
1. Multiflex has two cutters left&right
    when after calibrate the screen which mentioned in the (Exoerience No.2) must use meter ruler to double check the values

  2. For the segments status , putty status first move segment to low position and check the values from putty insulmeter if out of range then modified the insulmeter
    Mechanical limit not the same position as the software limit position need a bit far .

    after calibrated can check the things on the PDE

  3. Ups if red circle is flashing and alarms means Power supply is not ready

  4. rotary switch also with putty insulmeter

  5. this kind of limit switches led lights for see (power and activated status)

entry.title: MultiFlex/QFM project experience No.4 (calibrate the pump)
entry.content:
First of all BUTTONâ€Pump startâ€ cannot be activated if machine has faults.

  1. Go into DB25 to check the Pumpstop signals

  2. check PDE Screen Calibrationâ€“>Operationâ€“>Pumps

  3. GOTOâ€“>> Calibration , Choose Density of pump which to be calibrated.
    (1). add/modify the density

  4. Check the Dosinglist Min&Max kg/min

    check on the drawings , endress+hause available?
    if there choose the Massflow

    For the Set/Actual Multipicator from the values of previous project for reference after caibration it will automatically change .

  5. choose the current Density

  6. Point1 â€“>> 20% of Max â€“>> click â€”>> wait until Calculated value increase/decrease to the same as Set value (only 1% in tolerance) â€“>> click â€“>>Measured value the same as Set value â€“>> Click

  7. SF7 â€“>> SF8 commit and confirm the parameters

  8. For the double check . if the Min..Max is 0.15â€¦1.5 and Density is 1.05 then multiple both is the result 0.155
    open the calibration window again and input the 0.155 as the Set value then start the pump wait and see the Calcalated value will be identical to the Set value (1% in tolerance)

P.S. SF9 is used for give an number of (0â€¦10000) means (0â€¦10V) (MIN 1â€¦ MAX 15kg/min) to set the speed.

entry.title: MultiFlex/QFM project experience No.3 (festo / pump production&recirculation / motor control wizard)
entry.content:
The method to teach the festo remote module

  1. download the assigned ip address to the festo module from the hardware configuration Tia
  2. open the ip address in the browser to check the alarms
  3. if red light flashing on the module then try to teach
  4. remove the supply power wire a little then press the button in red square then reconnect the supply wire
  5. when after 3 seconds then release the button , two buttons one by one
  6. no red flashing all green , over.

if the same parameter but the motor output P not enough better change in the motor commissiong wizard
from U/F characteristic control to speed control encoderless

in the Call pump program block
the Production and Recirculation valve can only one be activated at the same time
so check here with the switch which on the control panel

entry.title: MultiFlex/QFM project experience No.2 (putty / segments / display)
entry.content:
putty has 3 legs . 1 and 3 output , 2 input it means we have to connect 10V to 1&3 , 2 to PLC to get the values

the number display which installed on the control cabinet CP40 can show the numbers but calibration needed
first time move to the minimum position and measure the actual distance then put it into display
second time move the maximum position do the same thing
after saw the â€œStoreâ€ then finished, if the Linear calculation is ok then the numbers is ok as you want.

in the PLC Dry parts/Call segments
this block is to check the alarms and the segments general status such as the all segments in Pos..

in this segment detail block
i_act means the acutal voltage value(0â€¦27648)
q_act means the actucal voltage value converted the (0â€¦10000) means (0â€¦10V) easier to understand
i_max & i_min means the software limits , little before the mechanical limits only works in automatic mode
i_top & i_bot is the mechanical limits
q_fltMax & q_fltMin means mechanical limits activated

entry.title: MultiFlex/QFM project experience No.1 (G120C speed settings/ safety / putty)
entry.content:
All the conveyor here are using P2000 to control the real speed it can be modified little here

if modified and seems not worked then check here

these parameters also be set during the Commissioning Wizard

if using the speed control(encoderless) motor with putty insulmeter then one param needed

double check the wiring

with the STO key to control the safty function you must set param here
Basic Fcuntions

Control type â€“>> via terminals (check wiring)

Also the Acceptance test needed

check the safty Input according to the drawing (16/17 are using for safty)

entry.title: Modify device network parameter while doing the configuration on TiaPortal software
entry.content:
Software needed:

  1. TiaPortal
  2. Proneta

If sometimes wanna to modify one device network parameter if just use the proneta to reset, it will be a alarm that â€œreset failedâ€ and you can see the Ip address and Mac address turn to Null but after a while maybe 30 seconds it turns back
how to solve this issues ? it because of the PLC write it back

so the first thing is unplug the PLC

then use proneta to reset the network parameter

after that you can configure the right things in the TiaPortal software as you usually did.

entry.title: Visual Studio 2019 C++ Environment issue
entry.content:
While using Visual Studio 2019 establish C++ projects compiling the projects found out issues that â€œNo such files XXXX.hâ€
After checking solution on the internet that

checking your windows version that

so you have to install the windows SDK software which match your windows version
previously i installed the windows 10SDK(10.0.18362.0) it caused lots of issues then removed and use Windows SDK(10.0.19041.0)instead .
Then everything goes well

no more fault while compiling the projects.

entry.title: Readme.txt
entry.content:
pie title My Skills "Siemens software" : 30 "Java" : 25 "C#" : 25 "Python" : 5"Pascal" : 10"Javascript" : 3"Database" : 2

Lots of years immersed in industrial field for the OEM machine control.
World is changing, Industry 4.0 is comingâ€¦.everything connected to the internet.

Siemens software include Step7/Microwin/Tia Portal/Scout/SIMOTION/Wincc/Wincc flexible/Hmi pro/Hmi lite â€¦
Java in JavaFx/Swing focus on Windows Application .
C# in Winform / WPF /Asp.net core / Unity .
Pascal in Simotion for motion control logic .
Python for web spider .
Database only Mysql and SqlServer .

In lesure time play the RaspberryPi for the new things now is learning the Openrcv

Currently working at Bonfiglioli China Factory as a automation engineer force on the whole factory industry 4.0 optimization..

  1. ESOP software â€¦
  2. to be continued â€¦

entry.title: RasperryPi install hass.io and more
entry.content:
1. Format tool
  2. Raspbian Buster with desktop https://www.raspberrypi.org/downloads/raspbian/
  3. download balenaEtcher https://www.balena.io/etcher/
  4. flash system to TF card then will show two disks in your file-explorer
  5. open the disk named boot , establish on empty SSH file
  6. æŠŠTFå¡æ’å…¥æ ‘è“æ´¾4ï¼Œç„¶åå¯åŠ¨ã€‚æŸ¥çœ‹è·¯ç”±å™¨ä¸­æ–°å¢çš„è®¾å¤‡ï¼Œé€šè¿‡SSHè½¯ä»¶è¿›è¡Œè®¿é—®ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ç”¨æˆ·åå¯†ç ä¸ºï¼špi/raspberry,è¿›å…¥ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚ ç”¨PUTTY
  7. è¾“å…¥sudo raspi-config,è¿›å…¥å¦‚ä¸‹ç•Œé¢ã€‚ é€‰æ‹©4 Localisation Options

entry.title: Siemns Tsend/rcv connection
entry.content:
REQ / EN_R should be rise edge activated , both conf be true.
Len is the length of communication data 3 means 3 bytes =24 bits.

7004
é€šä¿¡è¿æ¥å·²å»ºç«‹å¹¶ä¸”æ­£åœ¨å—åˆ°ç›‘è§†ã€‚æœªæ¿€æ´»ä»»ä½•æ¥æ”¶ä½œä¸šå¤„ç†ã€‚

å½“å‰æ­£æ¥æ”¶æ•°æ®ã€‚

check if the status of Tsend is 7004 and Trcv is 7006.

#CONNECT not input the parameters open Properties configure the Connection Data , Connection ID (should be different from the remote station) , the ip address , port

local select initiative establish the connections . remote select opposite thing .
